item.title: A Developer's Guide to Start a Blog
item.description: Are you trying to start a blog? Well, me too. I have been trying to start blogging for a long time now. I wanted a website that was managed by me to publish my blog. But managing my own website would mean investing time in writing HTML, JS and CSS files as well. I thought it be cool if I can publish blogs without leaving my editor, and don’t have to write markup and styling.
